section.p: The assessment findings associated with the patient's chest.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11609 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.195"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11597)/@code="NeweExam.25" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:11596)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11599), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.118 DYNAMIC (CONF:11598)
NEMSIS Trace: eExam.25

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:11610), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.119 DYNAMIC (CONF:11611)
NEMSIS Trace: eExam.24
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11597)/@code="NeweExam.25" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:11596)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:11599), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.118 DYNAMIC (CONF:11598)
NEMSIS Trace: eExam.25

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] targetSiteCode (CONF:11610), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.119 DYNAMIC (CONF:11611)

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="RQO"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.195" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="NeweExam.25" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
